item.title: Challenge of our generation: reproducible, transparent and reliable science
item.description:
Symposium summary: ISBE 2016, 3rd Aug, University of Exeter UK This post was first published on the Mozilla Science Lab blog
When approached to help organise a post-conference symposium on reproducibility in science at the International Symposium on Behavioural Ecology, I jumped at the opportunity! The symposium was the brainchild of Malika Ihle and Isabel Winney, both post-docs here at the University of Sheffield at the time. As early career scientists, we share feelings of concern and disillusionment by the apparent reproducibility crisis engulfing our profession.
